original_text: Jeroboam was a strong young man. Solomon saw that he did his work very well. So he made Jeroboam the leader of the workers who belonged to Joseph's tribe.
korean_text: 이 사람 여로보암은 큰 용사라 솔로몬이 이 청년의 부지런함을 보고 세워 요셉 족속의 일을 감독하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam was a strong young man
Solomon saw that he did his work very well
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 그가 일을 매우 잘하는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: So he made Jeroboam the leader
of the workers who belonged to Joseph's tribe
